```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data_3_longer, aes(x = Year, y = Percentage, fill = Category)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
  labs(title = "Percentage of Categories Over Years",
       x = "Year",
       y = "Percentage") +
  theme_minimal()


```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data_3_longer, aes(x = Year, y = Percentage, color = Category)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "Percentage Trends Over Years",
       x = "Year",
       y = "Percentage") +
  theme_minimal()
```


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data_3_longer, aes(x = Year, y = Percentage, fill = Category)) +
  geom_area() +
  labs(title = "Composition of Categories Over Years",
       x = "Year",
       y = "Percentage") +
  theme_minimal()
```


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data_3_longer, aes(x = Sex, y = Percentage, fill = Category)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
  labs(title = "Percentage of Categories by Gender",
       x = "Gender",
       y = "Percentage") +
  theme_minimal()

```
